tipForInfo: By making your page visible you can share it, you increase your visibility for brands and companies, facilitating access to your information and expanding your opportunities, sharing this link with potential interested parties.
tipForAlert: To make your page visible and share your profile with friends or interested brands, you need to fill out all the registration information in the Hub, have a link with the social network with the cost per content and activate a profile in Creators Insights.
activationQuestion: Which social networks do you want to activate for Creator Insights?
insightsText: At the moment, our insights and metrics are available only for Instagram.
